title: The Green Divorce: Tatiana Naturova Off With Ivan Pagonov
description: The dominant symbols of life on our planet - Human and Nature - embodied by the personas of these surreal poems. An ambiguous, constant fight between these mighty inhabitants of the planet. Love and hate, a death path paved for either of them. Will this war eventually lead to a Green Divorce? The choice has always been yours.Show More Show Less
author: Christos R. Tsiailis
